fields.summary: The structure of list in editor is broken when using with shortcut links.
If the items in a bullet list are collor coded, this will give proplems. The enter will not be put in the right place and bullet items will be added to each aother.

fields.description:
* Update atlassian-core with Wojciech's change 
* Optionally add my JAI based renderer for the JPEGs that cannot be rendered. 
* Fix the thumbnail servlet (all the thumbnails are currently stored as JPEG) 
* Write an upgrade task that removes all the JPEG thumbnails.

Note:


    * Added stream based renderer for images that exceed a certain dimension (currently 5000px).
    * Added a JAI based renderer that will be used as a fallback renderer for images
      with embedded colour profiles that cause a [CMMException|CONF-21418].
    * Updated upgrade task.
    * Added an adaptive strategy that take the available free memory into account in order to decide whether to use
      the raster based (high quality, high memory consumption) or stream based (lower quality,
      low memory consumption, faster) approach.
fields.summary: Fix the Thumbnail rendering that fails for transparent images (PNG/GIF) and for certain images with embedded color profiles (CMMException)

fields.description:
This only happens in wiki markup.  I'm not sure when the bug was introduced.

Pressing Enter in a macro browser field usually confirms the insert or edit (not for text area fields like body obviously).
When using the wiki markup editor it Cancels the dialog instead.
fields.summary: Hitting Enter in the Macro Browser cancels instead of inserting

fields.description:
The following are still in English in the admin panel despite that non-English plugin is enabled in Confluence:
- Configure WhiteList
- Thread Dump
- Import from another wiki

For bug fix team, while you are at it can you please fix the 'Build RSS' internationalization as well.

Please see screenshot: [^screenshot.jpg]
fields.summary: Partial translation for some menu in Confluence Admin panel

fields.description:
After upgrading to 3.4.3 or 3.4.5, the original admin "confluenceadmin", no longer be a Confluence administrator! Now I have no access to admin functions!
Using external PostgreSQL database.
fields.summary: Admin user is no longer the admin after upgrade from 3.4.1 to 3.4.3 or 3.4.5

fields.description:
Trying to add attachments in Confluence and am getting a JS error - ONLY after I click Insert > Attachment

Webpage error details

User Agent: Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 8.0; Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; Trident/4.0; SLCC2; .NET CLR 2.0.50727; .NET CLR 3.5.30729; .NET CLR 3.0.30729; Media Center PC 6.0; MDDR; InfoPath.2; .NET4.0C)
Timestamp: Tue, 14 Dec 2010 20:05:11 UTC

Message: Invalid argument.
Line: 9582
Char: 4
Code: 0
URI: https://santized.example.com/confluence/s/2033/1/3.4.3/_/download/batch/com.atlassian.confluence.tinymceplugin:editor-resources/com.atlassian.confluence.tinymceplugin:editor-resources.js

Tasks added via Macro Browser for the Dynamic Tasklist Macro do not include a task ID

fields.description:
After changing Confluence language to French "Browse > Confluence Admin > Languages > français", the move screen invoked by using "Outils > Déplacer" at any page, shows overlapped text in the second page body item, and in the bottom both items.

Images attached.
fields.summary: Text on screen to move page overlapped by form field in French Language
Plugins gives error. What to do?
The error message is not appropriate for the blank username and password field

fields.description:
Open the Activity Stream gadget in the Macro Browser.

The 'author' parameter has a default value of 'Atlassian'.

This doesn't seem to be correct.
fields.summary: Activity Stream gadget has 'Atlassian' as the default value for the 'author' parameter

fields.description: In order to get the fix for https://studio.atlassian.com/browse/PLUG-691 into Confluence we should upgrade the plugin framework from 2.6.1 to 2.6.4
fields.summary: Upgrade plugin framework dependency from 2.6.1 to 2.6.4

fields.description:
To reproduce:

* Go to exportspacexml.action
* Click 'Deselect All' and check the box for a single page
* Click Export button
* After the space export has completed, download it

It will contain all pages in the space, not just the selected page.

h2. Workaround

h3. Server-side Permanent Workaround

Edit the {{confluence/importexport/includes/export-spacetree-checkboxes.vm}} file and change the following line from:
{code:html}
<input class="radio centered" type="radio"  id="contentOptionVisible" name="contentOption" value="all" checked="checked">
{code}
to this:
{code:html}
<input class="radio centered" type="radio"  id="contentOptionVisible" name="contentOption" value="visible" checked="checked">
{code}

h3. Client-side Temporary Workaround

Using a tool like [Firebug|http://getfirebug.com/], right-click on the "Visible to you" radio button on the export as XML page and clickon "Inspect Element". Edit the "value" attribute's value and set it to "visible":

{code:html}
<input type="radio" checked="checked" value="visible" name="contentOption" id="contentOptionVisible" class="radio centered">
{code}
fields.summary: Selection of pages is not working for XML space export
Incorrect IP address used to make connection to database

fields.description:
The behaviour of the two methods varies for users who have a default profile picture:

* getProfilePictureUri()
* getProfilePictureUri(int, int)

The second one will return null if the user has Confluence's default profile picture, whereas the first one will not. The first method should be fixed to behave the same way as the second.
fields.summary: Behaviour of users with default profile pic varies between two implementations of ConfluenceUserProfile.getProfilePictureUri

fields.summary: Server error when requesting pages concurrently

fields.description:
We just switched the default editor to Rich text, and now, certain pages give the following error when we try to edit them with Firefox 3.6.13.

"A script on this page may be busy, or it may have stopped responding. You can stop the script now, or you can continue to see if the script will complete.

Script: https://wiki-bsse.ethz.ch/s/2029/7/3/_/download/superbatch/js/batch.js:144"
If a user's default is "Wiki markup" they can just stop the script and carry on, but in Rich text, there's just a blank pane after stopping the script.

There's no error in IE8, it works in both Rich text and Wiki markup.

I also restarted Confluence, but the error is there before and after
fields.summary: Unresponsive script error when default editor set to Rich Text

fields.description: Help text of "List Style" has 'square' mispelled
fields.summary: Mispelling at "Insert 'Table of Contents' Macro"

fields.description: The support request feature should allow users to select their issue type. This will also require a modification to the mail handlers to be able to parse that information.
fields.summary: Support Request should allow Issue Type Selection

fields.description: This request is for an enhancement to the Children Macro.  We use the children macro to pull in pages for feature requests and features, including excerpts.  The issue that I am having is that we have specifications as child pages as well and I don't want to include those.  It would be perfect if we could add labels as a parameter to the Children macro so that I can pull in pages that have the feature or feature_set label only.
fields.summary: Modify {children} macro to all for a labels parameter

fields.description: While displaying the results of Content by Label macro we are not able to get any excerpts at all. However, in the [documentation|http://confluence.atlassian.com/display/CONF33/Content+by+Label+Macro] the parameter is ambiguosly defined as 'excerpts' in the table but as 'excerpt' in the example. Nevertheless, both parameters turns out to work pretty similarly.
fields.summary: Content by Label Macro doesn't Display excerpts in the results

fields.description: There should be an additional checkbox on the E-mail settings page that says "Subscribe to watches". Many of our users like to watch pages but don't necessarily want to be e-mailed about them. They should be able to choose their e-mail receivership options more granularly and turn off receiving e-mails about their watches if they want. (Some of them are using watches as more of a 'favourite' functionality). The point is that they should be able to control all of their e-mail settings.
fields.summary: Better control of email notifications for watched content

fields.description:
If you're creating a new page or blog post and attach a file via the image or link dialogs, a number of incorrect things happen:

* watchers of the space and followers of the user who have notifications enabled will get a notification for the attachment
* the attachment is indexed and appears in the recently updated list on the dashboard

If the page is subsequently protected, the page title and attachment information has already been told to these people who are watching the page.

Attachments added to drafts should be indexed when the page is saved, and no notifications should be sent when they are attached.
fields.summary: Attaching files to drafts notifies watchers and indexes attachment

fields.description:
Attempting to upload a global logo results in an error similar to this: 

{code:none}
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Content must not be null
at org.springframework.util.Assert.notNull(Assert.java:112)
at com.atlassian.confluence.pages.attachments.CachingAttachmentDao.getLatestAttachment(CachingAttachmentDao.java:59)

at $Proxy18.getAttachment(Unknown Source)
{code}

{panel:title=Workaround|borderStyle=solid|borderColor=#3C78B5| titleBGColor=#3C78B5| bgColor=#E7F4FA}
Insert the Global Description [manually|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONF-13767?focusedCommentId=139652&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:comment-tabpanel#comment-139652] into your database as suggested in the related issue [CONF-13767|http://jira.atlassian.com/secure/QuickSearch.jspa?searchString=CONF-13767] and then restart your Confluence server.
{panel}
fields.summary: Content must not be null error when uploading global logo
Need a easy method to preserve multiple spaces and white space

fields.description:
As described under http://confluence.atlassian.com/display/CONFDEV/Job+Module?focusedCommentId=91127909#comment-91127909 there are suggestions in AbstractJob's code that anything extending AbstractJob will be wrapped in a proper transaction context and hibernate session and therefore not run into problems such as throwing LazyInitializationExceptions.

This is not currently the case, as mentioned at http://confluence.atlassian.com/display/CONFDEV/Job+Module?focusedCommentId=226787558#comment-226787558
fields.summary: Jobs that extend AbstractJob throw LazyInitializationException anyway
Calculation of creator/modifier data when indexing seems inefficient

fields.description:
1) I attach to a page a word file 2003 (attached) containing a table of content, an image, a link, an array, so not PURE TEXT
2) I use the "view" on it. It is properly converted to HTML (attached) 
3) I do a search on some text inside "a link to google"
4) The search results include some binary characters  (attached) coming directly from the word file and not from an HTML conversion of it.

IMO The system should display in the search results if there is a hit for this word, excel, PDF, PPT document... this way
A) get the (HTML) view of it first
B) keep only the text part (drop images...), arrays should be converted to all their cells...
C) present the part where the text was found (I believe that you present an excerpt but the start is OK too)
I believe that you already do A) and B) when you index this word document.

======== 2011/01/20 update with a different case

import the word document Unique Helmets.doc (attached) to a page.
It contains a couple of images which are uploaded as attachments of the page
If you search for it using "helmet" your search result shows this image bugImportedWordWithImagesGivesBadExcerpt.jpg (attached)
Basically you see the markup

========== I have been reported another case by my users 

create a new page
import the markup stored in MarkupForAPageWithExternalImages.txt (attached)
It is basically the same page but this time with external images.
When searched and found it looks like in in bugPageWithExternalmagesGivesBadExcerpt.JPG (attached)
Once again you see the markup. 


****************************

I guess that I could turn off showing the excerpt but this is not what I want or what the users want. 
I want some clean content which means you have to provide a pure "text" of any search result.
Just imagine to copy/paste the search result content to Notepad.
This is what should be shown.
fields.summary: Word document attachments returned as search results show up binary characters and we get the markup for imported images and external images

fields.description:
When viewing the dashboard of an instance with large spaces, IE will render painfully slow.

This is related to CONF-21414
fields.summary: Viewing spaces very slow on instances with large number of spaces

fields.description:
Reproduce:
* Add Page
* Paste {pagetree:root=@self} into the wiki markup
* Click preview
fields.summary: Previewing a pagetree with root=@self on the Add Page screen displays an error
"Favourite Pages" section on the dashboard has missing "star" image

fields.description:
This is what just happened to me:
* Hit add comment
* Started typing comment that started with a b
* Found myself on the "Add blogpost page".
(Annoying aside, hit cancel, went to "all blogposts rather than the previous view")

Causes:
* Comment editor didn't get focus by itself.
* Non-Editor shortcuts work even when the editor is visible but doesn't have focus.
fields.summary: Non-editor keyboard shortcuts shouldn't take effect while the editor is loading (Accidentally invoked shortcut while trying to write comment)

fields.description:
The new "auto watch" feature on Confluence is cool.  I previously never used Confluence notification emails before.

However they dont thread in Thunderbird.

!screenshot_53.png!

Some people have suggested that its related to the message id not being used correctly.  Whatever the cause it would be great of the notifications threaded.

Note they do thread in Gmail but then I am not using Gmail.  I hate Gmail threading with its collapsedness and not seeing stuff....
fields.summary: Threading of Confluence emails needs to be better

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-21422].
  {panel}

If you create frames in a word document using the FrameMaker, the frames will disappear and the content will get jumbled when viewing it through Confluence.

Steps to reproduce:
# Create a word file using the FrameMaker to create frames
# Attach it to Confluence
# Open the file through Confluence and see how it's formed
||
fields.summary: Word file gets jumbled in Confluence when Customized by FrameMaker

fields.description:
I was basically using Confluence as an HTML editor for some emails that I was drafting. I noticed that once I saved the Confluence page all of my 'style' tags were changed to 'mce_style' tags. For instance:
was changed to
See Screenshot 1. I also noticed that the 'mce_' style tag is added to tags. In fact, the link is duplicated. For instance Confluence TinyMCE editor renders these links as: Atlassian See Screenshot 2 This is unfortunate because I wanted to copy the HTML from the Confluence page and paste elsewhere. I will now have to remove all of the 'mce_' style tags. Also, Confluence's editor changes all lower-case tags to upper-case tags. For instance,
=
fields.summary: HTML macro changes style tags into 'mce_style' tags when Confluence page is saved.
Access to pages authored by removed user is very slow.

fields.description: Could the 'Minor change? (no notifications will be sent)' box be able to be set to be ticked by default on certain areas please, i.e. a page then its child pages. This would greatly help avoid minor edits accidentally being emailed to a large group of people if the editing person does not tick this box.
fields.summary: Minor change box ticked by default for certain areas

fields.description:
Some images suspected to contain EXIF data do not appear as thumbnails in gallery macro, image browser, etc. 

The attached file [^large2.jpg] can be used to reproduce this problem. Another file [^large2_fixed.jpg] is the one that is fixed using the workaround in the aforementioned KB.

{noformat}2010-12-07 17:25:11,428 ERROR [http-8341-5] [[Standalone].[localhost].[/].[file-server]] log Servlet.service() for servlet file-server threw exception
java.awt.color.CMMException: Invalid image format
	at sun.awt.color.CMM.checkStatus(CMM.java:131)
	at sun.awt.color.ICC_Transform.<init>(ICC_Transform.java:89)
	at java.awt.image.ColorConvertOp.filter(ColorConvertOp.java:516)
	at com.sun.imageio.plugins.jpeg.JPEGImageReader.acceptPixels(JPEGImageReader.java:1102)
	at com.sun.imageio.plugins.jpeg.JPEGImageReader.readImage(Native Method)
	at com.sun.imageio.plugins.jpeg.JPEGImageReader.readInternal(JPEGImageReader.java:1070)
	at com.sun.imageio.plugins.jpeg.JPEGImageReader.read(JPEGImageReader.java:885)
	at javax.imageio.ImageIO.read(ImageIO.java:1422)
	at javax.imageio.ImageIO.read(ImageIO.java:1326)
	at com.atlassian.core.util.thumbnail.Thumber.getImage(Thumber.java:281)
	at com.atlassian.core.util.thumbnail.Thumber.createThumbnail(Thumber.java:241)
	at com.atlassian.core.util.thumbnail.Thumber.retrieveOrCreateThumbNail(Thumber.java:215)
	at com.atlassian.confluence.pages.thumbnail.DefaultThumbnailManager.getThumbnail(DefaultThumbnailManager.java:108)
	at com.atlassian.confluence.importexport.resource.ThumbnailDownloadResourceManager.getResourceReader(ThumbnailDownloadResourceManager.java:44)
	at com.atlassian.confluence.importexport.resource.DelegatorDownloadResourceManager.getResourceReaderFromDelegate(DelegatorDownloadResourceManager.java:75)
	at com.atlassian.confluence.importexport.resource.DelegatorDownloadResourceManager.getResourceReader(DelegatorDownloadResourceManager.java:32)
	at com.atlassian.confluence.servlet.download.AttachmentDownload.getStreamForDownload(AttachmentDownload.java:65)
	at com.atlassian.confluence.servlet.download.ServeAfterTransactionDownload$StreamResultCallback.doInTransaction(ServeAfterTransactionDownload.java:140)
{noformat}
fields.summary: CMMException causes image attachment thumbnails to not appear

fields.description:
So there is no way of actually accessing the lower parts of the document, since it is impossible to scroll down. In IE it is possible to select text downwards and the page will move. With both browsers internal links from the word document TOC do work and go to the right place, but still it is impossible to move from that place in the page.

Tried with different documents and got the same results.
fields.summary: Page imported with the "Import Word Document" feature doesn't have scroll bars.

fields.description:
A [customer: Paul Buckle|https://support.atlassian.com/browse/CSP-54313?focusedCommentId=1458472&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels%3Acomment-tabpanel#action_1458472] (restricted to public) has reported the following:
{quote}
It stems around Atlassian's advice for raising a ticket in the first place.

Basically, in one place you suggest people raise a ticket via the Admin Console (see 1 below) but in another you recommend doing so online (see 2 below).

When using the Admin Console feature, it suggests you should only raise it online if you have problems using the built in feature (see 3 below).

It's all a bit contradictory, unless I'm simply reading it wrong!

Paul

(1) When attempting to do so online, you are advised (and I quote):

Automated Support Request Feature

Before you proceed, there is a feature we would like to bring to your attention. Your instance is capable of generating automatic support requests that include your log files, environment information and more. This information helps the support team give you a quicker and more effective response.

This feature can be found in your Administration Console. For more information please see the directions for Raising a Support Request.

Please consider using this feature if possible rather than manually creating the issue here.

(2) From your KB article at http://confluence.atlassian.com/display/DOC/Troubleshooting+Problems+and+Requesting+Technical+Support (and I quote):

* Method 1: (Recommended.) Raise a support ticket directly via our support site on the Internet, as described below. Then create a support zip file using the Support Utility, also described below. The advantage of this method is that it includes all the relevant files that Confluence support need. You can also be sure that the support case has been created and includes your logs.

* Method 2: Complete the support request form via your Confluence Administration Console, as described below. The disadvantage of this method is that your mail may not be forwarded correctly, due to restrictions imposed by your mail server. For example, the zip of your log files might be too large for your mail server to forward them on.

(3) When attempting to do so using the built-in Support Utility feature (and I quote):

Please consider using this feature if possible rather than manually creating the issue here.

When using the built-in Support Utility feature:

If you cannot download the support zip and upload it to the support case, or cannot create a support case at http://support.atlassian.com, you may prefer to create a support request via the confluence administration. However, please note that this should only be done if you cannot create a support request or download the support zip (created above), as your mail server may not forward the message properly or in a timely manner, thus making the process more error prone than manually attaching the support zip to the case
{quote}

h4. Proposed correction
In [Raising a Support Request|http://confluence.atlassian.com/display/DOC/Troubleshooting+Problems+and+Requesting+Technical+Support#TroubleshootingProblemsandRequestingTechnicalSupport-RaisingaSupportRequest], 'Method 2' should be the recommended way instead of 'Method 1'. This would bring it all into one line. And this does assume that raising it via the Admin Console is indeed Atlassian's preferred approach.
fields.summary: Contradiction about recommended way in raising Confluence support ticket

fields.description:
The recent performance fix (in 3.4) to the spaces macro has broken it on some databases when there are too many spaces.  Specifically, if there are more spaces than are allowed in an "IN" clause in the database then the macro will not work.  This macro appears on the dashboard and is in the bundled confluence-dashboard-macros plug-in.

The bug occurs while calculating the appropriate list of Team Labels to show, based on which labels appear in spaces the current user can see.
fields.summary: Space macro broken on instances with large number of spaces and some databases

fields.description:
h5. Problem Description
'Edit in Office' feature using Office 2010 will change attachment's Mime Type to Text/XML - causing attachment download problem with the following error: [^error.png]


h5. How to replicate
# Install Office 2010.
# Attach an attachment: Excel or Doc or PPT. Note down the attachment Properties.
# Edit in Office and save.
# Notice the attachment properties has changed to Text/XML regardless what it was previously.
# Try to download the attachment and the browser will refuse and show you an [error|^error.png].

\\
h5. Work around
Change attachment properties to what they were originally:
- XLS: application/vnd.ms-excel
- XLSX: application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.spreadsheetml.sheet
- DOC: application/msword
- DOCX: application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.wordprocessingml.document
- PPT: application/vnd.ms-powerpoint
- PPTX: application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.presentationml.presentation
fields.summary: Edit in Office using Office 2010 will change Mime Type to Text/XML - causing attachment download problem

fields.description: If you configure your server to have a context path then IE users will find that copying and pasting emoticons in the RTE results in broken images.
fields.summary: Copy and paste of emoticons shows broken image icon in IE7 and IE8

fields.description:
Delete the pages in the WAR installation guide that refer to unsupported platforms -- all children of this page except Tomcat:
http://confluence.atlassian.com/display/DOC/Installing+the+Confluence+EAR-WAR+Edition

Also remove the mention of Resin 3 on this page:
http://confluence.atlassian.com/display/DOC/Upgrading+Confluence+EAR-WAR+Distribution
fields.summary: Delete the pages in the WAR installation guide that refer to unsupported platforms

fields.description: See https://studio.plugins.atlassian.com/browse/WBDV-219
fields.summary: Inherited page edit restriction does not work in WebDAV
Improve client performance by enabling HTTP caching for i18n REST resources

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-21405].
  {panel}

I have a page with lots of attachments - in the Attachments View there are 5 pages of attachments. The attachments are images named e.g. P1040697, P1040698, P1040699 ... P1040798. They were all uploaded at "the same" time, IIRC it was through a UWC import. At any rate they all have the same timestamp. (Screenshot 1)
The default display on page 1 is not by Attachment name. It is useful for me to view the attachments list by name so I re-sort by Name. (Screenshot 2) If I then open the attachment properties for any given attachment, add a comment, and then return to the Attachments View page the "sort by name" setting is lost and I am back to the first page of the natural sort order - it's now evident that the natural sort order is by "modified date" as the attachment with the new comment added is now at the start of the list. (Screenshot 3) 
If I didn't make any changes to the attachment properties (e.g. hit the "Cancel" button) I'm still returned to the first page, in natural sort order, the attachment that I had selected before isn't even visible on the page.

It would be much better to 
# remember what is the sort order for the current attachments view page at least in the current session
# set a "default" attachment sort order in the attachments view page and store it for the user for any future session - this should be set for all "attachments view" pages once chosen, or can be returned to the global default sort order at the user's discretion.
fields.summary: Attachment view needs to remember its view options - page and sort selections
Paragraph formatting not retained for imported word doc
Attachment API leads to high risk of leaking file handles

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-21401].
  {panel}

# Create a new page, don't add a title (e.g. under space "source")
# Change the location to a different space (don't use home), e.g. space "dest", page "test"
# Click save and you get "You must enter a title." error.  
# The location changes from new space to "old space" but still refers to the page from the old space. E.g. It changes from dest > test, to source > test
# Enter a title
# Click Save
# Save fails with "The parent page specified does not exist." as the page "test" does not exist in source.
fields.summary: New location isn't remembered on error

fields.description:
Switch to French
Upload an attachment on a page
Click on "Properties / Proprietes"
Hover the icon at the right of Page (the magnifying glass)
The text is not localized, this is "Choose Page" while it should be "Choisir la page"

Not tested in German
fields.summary: Missing localisation for an icon on the file attachment properties page (Choose Page)

fields.description:
I had 2.10.4, 3.3.3, 3.4, 3.4.1 and 3.4.3 installed, the standalone versions .exe.
As a consequence I have the corresponding program groups in my start menu Confluence Evaluation X.Y.Z

I uninstall 3.4.

2.10.4 is left but all the other windows groups are gone.
The folders are still there ("C:\Program Files\Atlassian\Confluence Evaluation X.Y.Z" ).

I need to manually recreate the program groups and the shortcuts to launch.

JUST INSTALL THE CURRENT VERSION, NOT THE OTHER ONES.

test scenario, install 3.3.3 then 3.4 then 3.4.1. then 3.4.3 then remove 3.4
fields.summary: uninstalling one standalone version on Windows also removes the groups (Confluence Evaluation X.Y.Z) and their icons for the other versions installed
provide a "viewxps" macro, http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Open_XML_Paper_Specification
Support Zip64 format for xml backup

fields.description:
We have identified and fixed a cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Confluence {create-space-button} macro.

XSS vulnerabilities potentially allow an attacker to embed their own JavaScript into a Confluence page. You can read more about XSS attacks at various places on the web, including these:

    * cgisecurity.com: http://www.cgisecurity.com/articles/xss-faq.shtml
    * The Web Application Security Consortium: http://projects.webappsec.org/Cross-Site+Scripting

This issue is reported in our security advisory on this page:
http://confluence.atlassian.com/x/HgdrDQ
fields.summary: XSS vulnerability in Create Space Button macro

fields.description:
The source code (UploadAction.java) contains non localized code.
I am currently logged in French and see this error reported.
Nothing in this page is properly localized.
Why there is an error is another issue.

The source of this class contains other hard coded strings which seems to be displayed to the user in some other circumstances.
Test these ones in a foreign language too.

* Update, I have found the issue, a missing parse of content-navigation.vm containing the require pageid parameter *

This being said the localization requires work (see images)
- drag and drop placeholder
- temporary window
- error window
- non supported file (boot.ini)
fields.summary: Missing localisation in com.atlassian.confluence.plugins.dragdrop.UploadAction (from confluence-drag-and-drop-1.0.8.jar)

fields.description:
In IE7, when using the 'Image Browser' to insert files in a page, with a 1024x or a 1280x screen resolution the 'insert' and 'cancel' button are cut out and there is no way to scroll down on this page. 

The image browser is therefore unusable in this context.

FYI: Tried low resolution (1024x) on windows / Firefox and have not had this problem. Mac browsers also work for low resolution.
fields.summary: Image Browser unusable in IE7: 1024x or 1280x screen resolutions

fields.description:
Hi, just saw a bug while comparing the dashboard and the actual page. It seems that at least the symbols "!" and "C++" are not correctly rendered in the "Recently Updated - Favourite Spaces" section.

Confluence version: 3.5-m2
fields.summary: bug while rendering "Recently Updated - Favourite Spaces"

fields.description:
When shutting down confluence gracefully, it will emit a whole slew of runtime exceptions, due to the plugin system trying to emit events after the cache manager is stopped. Confluence will emit one of these stack traces per module descriptor that was enabled, and one per plugin that was enabled.
{code}
02/12/2010 2:03:18 PM org.apache.coyote.http11.Http11Protocol pause
INFO: Pausing Coyote HTTP/1.1 on http-8080
02/12/2010 2:03:19 PM org.apache.catalina.core.StandardService stop
INFO: Stopping service Catalina
2010-12-02 14:03:19,466 INFO [main] [confluence.importexport.impl.ConfluenceLocalSessionFactoryBeanForBackup] destroy Closing Hibernate SessionFactory
2010-12-02 14:03:19,479 INFO [main] [atlassian.plugin.manager.DefaultPluginManager] shutdown Shutting down the plugin system
2010-12-02 14:03:19,543 ERROR [Timer-4] [osgi.container.felix.FelixOsgiContainerManager] doLog EventDispatcher: Error during dispatch.
com.atlassian.plugin.event.NotificationException: java.lang.RuntimeException: The CacheManager has been shut down. It can no longer be used.
	at com.atlassian.plugin.event.impl.DefaultPluginEventManager.broadcast(DefaultPluginEventManager.java:92)
	at com.atlassian.plugin.osgi.factory.UnrecognizedModuleDescriptorServiceTrackerCustomizer.removedService(UnrecognizedModuleDescriptorServiceTrackerCustomizer.java:138)
	at org.osgi.util.tracker.ServiceTracker$Tracked.customizerRemoved(ServiceTracker.java:922)
	at org.osgi.util.tracker.AbstractTracked.untrack(AbstractTracked.java:351)
	at org.osgi.util.tracker.ServiceTracker$Tracked.serviceChanged(ServiceTracker.java:865)
	at org.apache.felix.framework.util.EventDispatcher.invokeServiceListenerCallback(EventDispatcher.java:864)
	at org.apache.felix.framework.util.EventDispatcher.fireEventImmediately(EventDispatcher.java:732)
	at org.apache.felix.framework.util.EventDispatcher.fireServiceEvent(EventDispatcher.java:662)
	at org.apache.felix.framework.Felix.fireServiceEvent(Felix.java:3726)
	at org.apache.felix.framework.Felix.access$000(Felix.java:80)
	at org.apache.felix.framework.Felix$2.serviceChanged(Felix.java:717)
	at org.apache.felix.framework.ServiceRegistry.unregisterService(ServiceRegistry.java:135)
	at org.apache.felix.framework.ServiceRegistrationImpl.unregister(ServiceRegistrationImpl.java:129)
	at org.springframework.osgi.service.exporter.support.internal.support.ServiceRegistrationDecorator.unregister(ServiceRegistrationDecorator.java:65)
	at org.springframework.osgi.util.OsgiServiceUtils.unregisterService(OsgiServiceUtils.java:41)
	at org.springframework.osgi.service.exporter.support.OsgiServiceFactoryBean.unregisterService(OsgiServiceFactoryBean.java:372)
	at org.springframework.osgi.service.exporter.support.OsgiServiceFactoryBean.unregisterService(OsgiServiceFactoryBean.java:362)
	at org.springframework.osgi.service.exporter.support.AbstractOsgiServiceExporter.destroy(AbstractOsgiServiceExporter.java:84)
	at org.springframework.beans.factory.support.DisposableBeanAdapter.destroy(DisposableBeanAdapter.java:151)
	at org.springframework.beans.factory.support.DefaultSingletonBeanRegistry.destroyBean(DefaultSingletonBeanRegistry.java:487)
	at org.springframework.beans.factory.support.DefaultSingletonBeanRegistry.destroySingleton(DefaultSingletonBeanRegistry.java:462)
	at org.springframework.beans.factory.support.DefaultSingletonBeanRegistry.destroySingletons(DefaultSingletonBeanRegistry.java:430)
	at org.springframework.context.support.AbstractApplicationContext.destroyBeans(AbstractApplicationContext.java:853)
	at org.springframework.osgi.context.support.AbstractOsgiBundleApplicationContext.destroyBeans(AbstractOsgiBundleApplicationContext.java:204)
	at org.springframework.context.support.AbstractApplicationContext.doClose(AbstractApplicationContext.java:831)
	at org.springframework.osgi.context.support.AbstractOsgiBundleApplicationContext.doClose(AbstractOsgiBundleApplicationContext.java:197)
	at org.springframework.osgi.context.support.AbstractDelegatedExecutionApplicationContext.access$501(AbstractDelegatedExecutionApplicationContext.java:69)
	at org.springframework.osgi.context.support.AbstractDelegatedExecutionApplicationContext$2.run(AbstractDelegatedExecutionApplicationContext.java:214)
	at org.springframework.osgi.util.internal.PrivilegedUtils.executeWithCustomTCCL(PrivilegedUtils.java:85)
	at org.springframework.osgi.context.support.AbstractDelegatedExecutionApplicationContext.normalClose(AbstractDelegatedExecutionApplicationContext.java:210)
	at org.springframework.osgi.extender.internal.dependencies.startup.DependencyWaiterApplicationContextExecutor.close(DependencyWaiterApplicationContextExecutor.java:374)
	at org.springframework.osgi.context.support.AbstractDelegatedExecutionApplicationContext.doClose(AbstractDelegatedExecutionApplicationContext.java:236)
	at org.springframework.context.support.AbstractApplicationContext.close(AbstractApplicationContext.java:794)
	at org.springframework.osgi.extender.internal.activator.ContextLoaderListener$1.run(ContextLoaderListener.java:522)
	at org.springframework.osgi.extender.internal.util.concurrent.RunnableTimedExecution$MonitoredRunnable.run(RunnableTimedExecution.java:60)
	at org.springframework.scheduling.timer.DelegatingTimerTask.run(DelegatingTimerTask.java:66)
	at java.util.TimerThread.mainLoop(Timer.java:512)
	at java.util.TimerThread.run(Timer.java:462)
Caused by: java.lang.RuntimeException: The CacheManager has been shut down. It can no longer be used.
	at com.atlassian.plugin.event.impl.MethodSelectorListenerHandler$1$1.invoke(MethodSelectorListenerHandler.java:67)
	at com.atlassian.event.internal.AsynchronousAbleEventDispatcher$2.run(AsynchronousAbleEventDispatcher.java:60)
	at com.atlassian.event.internal.AsynchronousAbleEventDispatcher$1.execute(AsynchronousAbleEventDispatcher.java:28)
	at com.atlassian.event.internal.AsynchronousAbleEventDispatcher.dispatch(AsynchronousAbleEventDispatcher.java:56)
	at com.atlassian.event.internal.EventPublisherImpl.invokeListeners(EventPublisherImpl.java:145)
	at com.atlassian.event.internal.EventPublisherImpl.publish(EventPublisherImpl.java:67)
	at com.atlassian.plugin.event.impl.DefaultPluginEventManager.broadcast(DefaultPluginEventManager.java:88)
	... 37 more
Caused by: java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
	at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
	at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:39)
	at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:25)
	at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:597)
	at com.atlassian.plugin.event.impl.MethodSelectorListenerHandler$1$1.invoke(MethodSelectorListenerHandler.java:49)
	... 43 more
Caused by: java.lang.IllegalStateException: The CacheManager has been shut down. It can no longer be used.
	at net.sf.ehcache.CacheManager.checkStatus(CacheManager.java:827)
	at net.sf.ehcache.CacheManager.getCache(CacheManager.java:536)
	at com.atlassian.confluence.cache.ehcache.EhCacheManager.getCache(EhCacheManager.java:68)
	at com.atlassian.confluence.cache.TransactionalCacheFactory.getCache(TransactionalCacheFactory.java:63)
	at com.atlassian.confluence.setup.bandana.ConfluenceCachingBandanaPersister.getCache(ConfluenceCachingBandanaPersister.java:41)
	at com.atlassian.confluence.setup.bandana.ConfluenceCachingBandanaPersister.retrieve(ConfluenceCachingBandanaPersister.java:54)
	at com.atlassian.bandana.DefaultBandanaManager.getValue(DefaultBandanaManager.java:32)
	at com.atlassian.bandana.DefaultBandanaManager.getValue(DefaultBandanaManager.java:24)
	at com.atlassian.confluence.plugin.BandanaPluginStateStore.load(BandanaPluginStateStore.java:29)
	at com.atlassian.plugin.manager.DefaultPluginManager.getBuilder(DefaultPluginManager.java:1529)
	at com.atlassian.plugin.manager.DefaultPluginManager.disablePluginModuleState(DefaultPluginManager.java:1364)
	at com.atlassian.confluence.plugin.ConfluencePluginManager.notifyModuleDisabled(ConfluencePluginManager.java:111)
	at com.atlassian.plugin.manager.DefaultPluginManager.onPluginModuleUnavailable(DefaultPluginManager.java:251)
	... 48 more
{code}

Addtionally, logging itself seems to get disabled before we stop trying to use it:
{code}
2010-12-02 14:03:20,765 INFO [main] [com.atlassian.confluence.lifecycle] contextDestroyed Stopping Confluence
log4j:ERROR LogMananger.repositorySelector was null likely due to error in class reloading, using NOPLoggerRepository.
{code}

Neither of these should be happening: it means our shutdown sequence needs to be tidied up.
fields.summary: Plugin notifications fail after cache manager has been shut down, logging switches to NOPLoggerRepository

fields.description:
How to Reproduce: 
   -download an Excel file test.xls. 
   -Add the file using the source code {viewxls:name=test.xls}
   -view the wiki
   -Hover the mouse just above the displayed Excel grid and the file
    name appears 
   -click on the file name and Excel opens 
   -The workbook and sheet are blank
fields.summary: When opening Excel Office Macro {viewxls:name=filename.xls} workbook and sheet are blank
option menus appear behind flash objects in IE

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-21379].
  {panel}

1) Just more convenient to have the System properties listed alphabetically for the keys
 I think that in some circumstance you also dump in the log the properties which could be sorted the same way.

2) I observe that the plug-ins are CLOSE to to be sorted correctly. Note these bad 2 at the end
    WebDAV Plugin 	2.5 	Atlassian 	Enabled
    Widget Connector 	1.3.5 	Atlassian 	Enabled
    atlassian-gadgets-shared-2.0.8.jar 	0.0 	(unknown) 	Disabled
    confluence-imagesearchrenderer-plugin 	1.2 	Atlassian 	Enabled

3) For the plug-ins, could you display Enabled, (fully) Disabled AND "Partially Enabled" when not 100% of the modules are enabled. There is no easy way to have the information on the plug-in menu, you need to expand one plug-in at a time. Sadly, I have seen many case where it blows up when you do this or you loose all your expanded plugins.

4) Add a button to run a GC (garbage collection) close to the memory and refresh after. 

5) Bad vendor for the Social Bookmarking Plugin: ${project.organization.name}

5) 1 to 3 on the Support Utility menu
fields.summary: On the administration screen / System Information various enhancements

fields.summary: in the general configuration menu, the tips on the right are not in the same order as the settings
Bundle Confluence with Tomcat 6.0.20

fields.description:
In September 2007 the attachment-rss-content.vm was rewritten such that Attachment items in RSS feeds contain only minimal information: What attachment was modified, who modified it, when, what page/blog it's on.  The class that invokes that template and provides the Velocity context was left unchanged.  It gets the full history of the attachment and renders the page/blog the attachment is on into html, which can take considerable time if it has macros on it.  

This can cause major issues from a performance point of view when somebody attaches multiple things to a page with an attachments macro on it, particularly considering [CONF-21373].
fields.summary: AttachmentRenderSupport does lots of unnecessary work

fields.description:
When you edit the space details, the '*Home Page*' is not set to the current setting.  It is set to:
# "Home" if the space has a page called "Home" OR
# blank otheriws. (The empty line is selected in the dropdown list.) 
This happens even if you have previously set a home page.

If you then change the space name or description but don't set the space home page, it's very confusing. By default, Confluence will now show the "Pages" view (Recently Updated, Alphabetical or Tree View) whenever anyone goes to the space, rather than the home page.

Instead, the '*Home Page*' dropdown should retain the value as previously set.
fields.summary: Setting of space home page is not retained, causing home page to be set to blank when you edit space details

fields.description:
An attachment can have an unlimited number of versions, there are no constraints around this and performance suffers when there are too many versions. Specific instances where there should be some sort of limit:
* When Confluence displays a file's history in the Attachments view or the Attachments macro, the entire history is always displayed.
* When getPreviousVersions is called on the AttachmentManager there is no way to say "only X" and no limit is enforced.

Additionally, the relationship between an attachment and its histories is not cached, so there can be unnecessary hits to the database.  There is an "Attachments Version" cache defined, but I can't see where anything would ever get written to it.

This is the case in Confluence 3.4, and I suspect that with the possible exception of caching, this has always been an issue.  Obviously having many versions of the same attachment is something that *usually* doesn't occur.
fields.summary: No limits on historic attachments

fields.description:
When moving a page with 5 or more children to a new space, the UI component shows "Move failed. There was a problem contacting the server." The page cannot be moved.

A [related article from the knowledge base|http://confluence.atlassian.com/display/CONFKB/Unable+to+Move+Pages+with+Attachments] originally suggested a data integrity problem with the Ancestors table, but there is a replicable bug as well:

*Steps to reproduce:*
# created a page w/ no page content. Attached 2 .png files to the page
# created 5 copies of this page and then, using the Space Admin Pages view, drag & dropped them into a hierarchy - one page below the other, until the pages are a total of 6 levels deep - 1 child page below each parent
# use the Tools -> Move Page menu item. Select another Space and tried moving under the Home page for that Space

Result:

# get "Move failed. There was a problem contacting the server." in the GUI
# ALL attachments to all pages in the page tree are gone -- seemingly irrecoverably (short of going to backup).

*Workaround*
There's a recovery script posted [here|http://confluence.atlassian.com/x/IRQD]. There's a find and recover attachments script there.
fields.summary: Page move fails with deep page hierarchy
turn off the auto formatting in Confluence when we import a new document on a page

fields.description:
When using the rich text editor in Confluence, it appears that you can have a table cell that contains an unidented line, followed by bullets, followed by an unindented line, followed by bullets in a single table cell. However, when saved, what you see in the RTE is not what you get in the displayed wiki page. The line that should be unindented under the first list of bullets is not unindented. Similarly, I cannot find a way to do this via wiki markup.

This has been a long standing bug in Confluence, and we've had trouble with it in the description within the version history on this page (manually created vs. metadata version history table because we have to include the properties file for each jar, for now at least):

https://studio.plugins.atlassian.com/wiki/display/SHBL/Confluence+Shibboleth+Authenticator

(btw- Many, many thanks for fixing things such that we can deep link into svn tags via https for stuff migrated from the old svn repo. It makes our page much easier to maintain!)
fields.summary: Confluence doesn't display table cell contents properly when unidented text in cell under bullets within same cell

fields.description:
I cannot view spaces.
Error formatting macro: spaces: org.springframework.dao.DataIntegrityViolationException: Hibernate operation: Could not execute query; SQL []; Prepared or callable statement has more than 2000 parameter markers.; nested exception is java.sql.SQLException: Prepared or callable statement has more than 2000 parameter markers.
fields.summary: I cannot view spaces.

fields.description: When a number of plugins that add entries to the Tools menu are installed, the lower end of the menu is hidden by the "powered by " page footer.
fields.summary: Tools menu obscured by "powered by..." footer when number of options is long

fields.description:
This is slightly different from CONF-996

h5. Background information
Updating Confluence pages using the remote API is handy when it involves bulk content (eg. thousands of pages). This however can create a horde of page versions for each update, causing the performance issues discussed in CONF-996.

h5. Feature Request
Please create a new method in Confluence remote API to allow a content update without accumulating a new page version.
fields.summary: Add a remote API method to allow content edit without creating a new page version

fields.description:
Custom footers does not appear in pages that has a table inside a section macro in Documentation Theme.

Steps to reproduce:
# Create a custom footer in a space that has the Documentation Theme set, in the _Configure Theme_ option.
# Check if the footer is there by going to the home page of the space in question.
# Now edit the home page and add the following empty table with the section macro:
{code}
{section}
| | | | | | | | | | |
| | | | | | | | | | |
| | | | | | | | | | |
| | | | | | | | | | |
{section}
{code}
# Now see that the footer is no longer there.
||

*Workaround:* Remove the section macro and the footer will show up.
fields.summary: Custom Footer in Documentation Theme Does Not Work When There's a Table Inside a Section Macro
i18n property displayed on cluster info screen
Authentication filter not applied for resource forwards

fields.description:
This issue requires 2 sessions to reproduce. 

1. Open session A to the administration console.
2. Copy the url
3. Open session B and access Confluence as the anonymous user
4. Paste the url

You will get a screen that is blank except for the words "Administrator Access" so there is no way to log in.

Just as a check, I made sure that taking off web-sudo will not allow someone into the admin screen this way.
fields.summary: Pasting an admin link into a session with anonymous access results in a blank screen with text "Administrator Access"

fields.description:
JIRA issues macro has a potential of bringing down Confluence with OOM, when retrieved from RSS.

There is a patch written as a work around (need minor tweaking), please see sister case in https://studio.plugins.atlassian.com/browse/CONFJIRA-200
fields.summary: Lower the limit for the number of issues retrieved from JIRA
System Plugin warning is scary and wrong

fields.description:
This is related to the fix for [Confdev-918|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFDEV-918]

IE7 no longer crashes when I cancel the add page dialog, but the fix appears to have created a black flicker.  

From the dashboard:
* click on add page

or 

* click on add blog post.  

If you keep clicking "add page" or "add blog post" you can see a spinner.
fields.summary: There is a big black flicker when clicking on "add page" or "add blog post"

fields.description:
* Go to a page which has many levels of parenthood
* Hover over the ellipse in the breadcrumbs

The tooltip that shows contains the hidden parents, but the spacing is very messed up - there is too much padding between the page titles.

See screenshot. Happens on all supported browsers.
fields.summary: Breadcrumbs: Text in tooltip is messed up

fields.description:
* Create a User Macro in 3.1.2
* Upgrade to 3.4
* Go to the User Macro screen

The table of User macros shows that the title is the same as the name. This is also case if you view it in the Macro Browser.

However, if you edit the macro, then the Title field is blank. As it is a mandatory field, you cannot save changes to the User Macro without filling it in.

This is potentially confusing - as in some places the UI is telling you that the UM has a title, while on the edit screen the title is blank.
fields.summary: User Macros: After upgrading to 3.4 the Macro Title should default to the Macro name

fields.description: After inserting screenshots as thumbnails within the "expand" macro (Installation guide on CAC), the size of the image automatically becomes 2.5 x 2.5 and cannot be clicked to view full size. If I try to right-click and select "View Image" then it will navigate away from the page and show the full size.
fields.summary: Thumbnails lose resolution when placed inside an expand macro

fields.summary: Missing localisation localization on the keyboard shortcuts screen

fields.description:
Links will only be refactored in a comment if the link contains the space key. For example:

\[Page B] will not refactor if Page B is renamed, but \[space:Page B] will. This is usually apparent when a link has been coded using wiki markup rather than the Rich Text editor.
fields.summary: Renaming a page does not refactor links in comments unless a space key is included in the link syntax

fields.description: Using FireFox 3.6 I came across an RTE emoticon table bug. I was inserting emoticons into a table column using the RTE. The emoticons don't save in preview or save mode (see attachments). Using Wiki Markup, it seems to work fine. Table is on this page: https://extranet.atlassian.com/x/6gWBbg
fields.summary: RTE emoticon table bug

fields.description: When table of contents are created for a page it is not created according to the titles given. Most of the headings are missing even after setting the min and max heading values correctly.
fields.summary: Table of contents not updating properly

fields.description: With PDF style sheets, one can add things like page numbers and fixed text.  It would be desirable to have a mechanism to insert the date on which the PDF export operation occurred.
fields.summary: Allow entry of current date in exported PDF header/footer
